normal.speaker: Cole
normal.line: I-I'm just... going to stand here. Yes. This is a good, safe spot.

normal.speaker: Cole
normal.line: This armor is... really heavy. But it's s-safe! Safe is good, right?

normal.speaker: Cole
normal.line: I... I really don't like fighting. Are you s-sure there isn't a... a peaceful option?

normal.speaker: Cole
normal.line: This axe? Oh, it's... it's mostly for... c-chopping wood! Yes. Mostly.

taunt.speaker: Cole
taunt.line: P-Please don’t hit me... I’m just trying to survive here!

taunt.speaker: Cole
taunt.line: I-I’m fully armored, so... I’ll be fine, right? Right...?

taunt.speaker: Cole
taunt.line: This axe is so heavy... please don’t make me swing it!!

taunt.speaker: Cole
taunt.line: I'm s-so sorry about this! I have to... but I don't want to! Please run away!
